title: The Changing hills
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Dennis Hill Productions and John Martin-Jones
brief_description: Tells of the way in which the Snowy Mountains Hydro-electric Scheme has altered the area and its way of life. Traces the development of the scheme, outlining the vast scientific and engineering resources and processes bringing the project to fruition. Shows how the project has brought new leisure and pleasure to Australia and Australians.
